name: thundercats-chat
description: Example Flux chat application primarily intended to explain the use of thundercats.js.

scripts.start: watchify js/app.jsx -r react -d -t [ babelify --sourceMaps false --optional es7.classProperties ] -g envify -o js/bundle.js
scripts.build: NODE_ENV=development browserify js/app.jsx -t [ babelify --optional es7.classProperties ] -g envify -o js/bundle.js

author: Bill Fisher
